name: Axe Mining
description:
Axe mining is a dynamic turn-based game made for an academic gamejam where our condition was to use a custom grid (No tilemap were used in this project). You are a dwarf mining ore in a cave. The pickaxe was too expensive (We used pre-made assets but all of them were free to use) so you are using an axe instead. Avoid the bombos and dive into this short (but great) adventure!

Controls

  • Moving : Arrow keys and/or WASD keys
  • Mine: Just move towards the wall containing the ore

Credits

This game uses the following pre-made assets:

  • Sounds effects and music were taken from opengameart.org like the main title music composed by Fabian.
  • The sprite of the dwarf was made by the amazing Elthen.
  • The other sprites were all made either by OrniFrost or Dbien on Aseprite 1.1.7dev.

And the team was:

  • Dbien
  • OrniFrost
  • Shu (me)
